message_1:
Consider the following substitution cipher: 

A = Q, B = Y, C = E, D = X, E = L, F = R, G = T, H = W, I = Z, J = V, K = N, L = P, M = U, N = O, O = M, P = S, Q = A, R = F, S = I, T = G, U = K, V = D, W = H, X = J, Y = B, Z = C.

Decrypt the message "FTQ JCUU" using the given substitution cipher.
message_2:
To decrypt the message "FTQ JCUU", we will replace each letter with its corresponding letter in the substitution cipher.

F = R
T = G
Q = A
J = V
C = E
U = K

So, the decrypted message is "RGA VEKK".
